messages.title: Forward Together
messages.content: Conservatives are realistic about the economic situation so will tackle social inequalities and the challenges of an ageing society whilst being fair to the young generation. We want to preserve our environment, strengthen our education system and enhance our NHS. We want to preserve our Union, defend our country and increase security against crime and terrorism whilst providing global leadership and development.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Need to deliver a smooth and orderly departure from the European Union and forge a deep and special partnership integrating friends and allies across Europe.
Building a strong economy based on sound public finances, low taxes and better regulation.
To continue to fight for a fair share of resources for all our local services.
To continue to work with Councillors, the NHS, the Police and local organisations to provide a safe and secure environment for all residents.

issues.brexitEurope: We need to deliver a smooth and orderly departure from the European Union and forge a deep and special partnership integrating friends and allies across Europe.
issues.economy: To pay for this we need a strong economy built on sound public finances, low taxes and better regulation. It is our intention to reduce taxes on Britain’s businesses and working families, guarantee annual increases in the state pension and provide real opportunity for all.
issues.environment: I am proud to have championed the Chilterns throughout my time in Parliament.
issues.health: We want to preserve our environment, strengthen our education system and enhance our NHS.

community.content: To continue to fight for a fair share of resources for all our local services.

endorsements.endorsement: It is only by voting for Cheryl Gillan that you can be assured the government led by me – or weakened by Jeremy Corbyn.

examples: We want to preserve our environment, strengthen our education system and enhance our NHS. We want to preserve our Union, defend our country and increase security against crime and terrorism whilst providing global leadership and development.
To pay for this we need a strong economy built on sound public finances, low taxes and better regulation.
Support our local area and environment, protecting the Chilterns from excessive development, allowing only limited growth in the villages.
To continue to work with Councillors, the NHS, the Police and local organisations to provide a safe and secure environment for all residents.
To continue to fight for a fair share of resources for all our local services.
Need to deliver a smooth and orderly departure from the European Union and forge a deep and special partnership integrating friends and allies across Europe.

personalStories.story: It has been my privilege to represent the Chesham and Amersham constituency for the past twenty-five years so I hope I have managed to learn what matters most to local people.

examples: Theresa May - It is only by voting for Cheryl Gillan that you can be assured the government led by me – or weakened by Jeremy Corbyn.
It is only by voting for Cheryl Gillan that you can be assured the government led by me – or weakened by Jeremy Corbyn.
I have already obtained extra funding through the sensitive stages of construction and will continue to use my expertise to hold HS2 to account.
I am proud to have championed the Chilterns throughout my time in Parliament.
